recommendationMessages.startYourFitnessJourney: You haven't been active recently. Consider starting with a beginner workout plan.

recommendationMessages.tryNewEquipment: You've been using the same equipment. Try exploring different machines for better results!

recommendationMessages.weightGainDetected: You've gained weight. Consider adjusting your workout plan to maintain your goals.

aiWorkoutPrompt.title: Customize Your Workout Plan
aiWorkoutPrompt.description: Tell us what you want to focus on. We'll create a personalized workout plan just for you!
aiWorkoutPrompt.example3: I want to improve my cardio endurance
aiWorkoutPrompt.placeholder: E.g., I want to focus on upper body strength and core...
aiWorkoutPrompt.hint: Be specific about your goals, preferred exercises, or areas you want to target.

workouts.aiPlanCreatedDesc: Your AI workout plan has been created. Check your workout recommendations on the home screen!
